channel.title: Larry Miller
channel.description: Recent news about Larry Miller, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by Bayshore Broadcasting News Centre
item.description:
Funding for Fisheries Projects
Gail Shea -- the Minister of Fisheries and Oceans, as well as Bruce Grey Owen Sound MP Larry Miller -- have announced up to 1.4 million dollars in funding for fisheries projects. Through the Recreational Fisheries Conservation Partnership Program -- the ...

item.title: Mentioned by BlackburnNews.com
item.description:
Feds To Invest In Lion's Head Small Craft Harbour
Grey Bruce Owen Sound MP Larry Miller was on hand at the harbour this afternoon with Minister of Fisheries and Oceans, the Honourable Gail Shea for the announcement. The exact amount of the federal contribution won't be known until after tenders are ...

item.title: Mentioned by Bayshore Broadcasting News Centre
item.description:
Funding for Lion's Head Harbour
Shea was in Lion's Head on Friday afternoon along with Bruce Grey Owen Sound Conservative MP Larry Miller. They were announcing funding from the Small Craft Harbours program for a repair project at the Lion's Head harbour. Shea says the government ...

item.title: Mentioned by Bayshore Broadcasting News Centre
item.description:
